resources.string:
Educational Info Cards

Tap on celestial objects in manual mode to see educational info cards with descriptions, scientific data (distance, size, magnitude, spectral class), and fun facts. Covers planets, bright stars, and Messier objects.

Improved Location Permission Experience

When location permission isn\'t granted on first launch, you now see a clear dialog with options to grant permission, enter your location manually, or dismiss and use the default. Replaces the old truncated toast message that was easy to miss.

Fix for Upside-Down Labels

Fixed a bug reported by some users where sky labels appeared upside down due to a sensor orientation issue.

Night Mode for Help Pages

The in-app help pages now respect night mode, so they won\'t blind you when you\'re out stargazing.

Refreshed Help Pages

Help content has been restyled and updated, including an updated acknowledgments section recognizing open source contributors.

Translation Updates

  • Updated Polish translation
  • Fixed Greek translation
  • Added missing Portuguese translations
